mapper.select: SELECT board_id, title, dog_breed, dog_sex, found_location FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC (LOST_FOUND LOST_FOUND_IX)*/ rownum rn, board_id, title, dog_breed, dog_sex, found_location FROM lost_found LF, dog D WHERE LF.dog_id = D.dog_id AND status = 'n' AND rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} AND board_id > 0 ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} ORDER BY board_id DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM lost_found WHERE board_id > 0

SELECT ROWNUM, W.* FROM ( SELECT match_id, match_title, match_content, photo_name, photo_path, A.member_nickname as receiver_nick, B.member_nickname as sender_nick FROM ( SELECT match_id, match_title, match_content, photo_name, photo_path, sender_id, mb.member_nickname FROM lost_found_matched M, lost_found_request R, member MB WHERE M.request_id = R.request_id AND R.receiver_id = MB.member_id ) A, member B WHERE A.sender_id = B.member_id ORDER BY match_id DESC ) W WHERE rownum <= 9

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT LF.board_id, LF.member_id, LF.title, D.dog_breed, D.dog_sex, D.found_location, P.front_name FROM lost_found LF, dog D, lost_found_photo P WHERE LF.dog_id = D.dog_id AND LF.board_id = P.board_id AND LF.category = 'lost' AND LF.status = 'n' ORDER BY board_id DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 9

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT LF.board_id, LF.member_id, LF.title, D.dog_breed, D.dog_sex, D.found_location, P.front_name FROM lost_found LF, dog D, lost_found_photo P WHERE LF.dog_id = D.dog_id AND LF.board_id = P.board_id AND LF.category = 'find' AND LF.status = 'n' ORDER BY board_id DESC ) A WHERE rownum <= 9

SELECT R, match_id, match_title, match_content, photo_name, photo_path, receiver_nick, sender_nick FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, W.* FROM ( SELECT match_id, match_title, match_content, photo_name, photo_path, A.member_nickname as receiver_nick, B.member_nickname as sender_nick FROM ( SELECT match_id, match_title, match_content, photo_name, photo_path, sender_id, mb.member_nickname FROM lost_found_matched M, lost_found_request R, member MB WHERE M.request_id = R.request_id AND R.receiver_id = MB.member_id ) A, member B WHERE A.sender_id = B.member_id ORDER BY match_id DESC ) W WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC ) WHERE R > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT R, board_id, member_id, title, dog_breed, dog_sex, found_location, front_name FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, LF.board_id, LF.member_id, LF.title, D.dog_breed, D.dog_sex, D.found_location, P.front_name FROM lost_found LF, dog D, lost_found_photo P WHERE LF.dog_id = D.dog_id AND LF.board_id = P.board_id AND LF.category = 'lost' AND LF.status = 'n' ORDER BY board_id DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC ) WHERE R >(#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM lost_found WHERE category = 'lost' AND status = 'n' AND board_id > 0

SELECT R, board_id, member_id, title, dog_breed, dog_sex, found_location, front_name FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, LF.board_id, LF.member_id, LF.title, D.dog_breed, D.dog_sex, D.found_location, P.front_name FROM lost_found LF, dog D, lost_found_photo P WHERE LF.dog_id = D.dog_id AND LF.board_id = P.board_id AND LF.category = 'find' AND LF.status = 'n' ORDER BY board_id DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC ) WHERE R >(#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM lost_found WHERE category = 'find' AND status = 'n' AND board_id > 0
mapper.insert: insert into lost_found (category, board_id, member_id, dog_id, title, content, board_date, status, y, x) values (#{category}, #{board_id}, #{member_id}, #{dog_id}, #{title}, #{content}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhh24mi'), 'n', #{y}, #{x})

insert into dog (dog_id, dog_type, member_id, dog_name, dog_breed, dog_sex, dog_size, dog_note, found_date, found_location) values (#{dog_id}, 'stray', #{member_id}, #{dog_name}, #{dog_breed}, #{dog_sex}, #{dog_size}, #{dog_note}, #{found_date}, #{found_location})
INSERT INTO lost_found_photo ( board_id, category, front_name, front_path) VALUES (#{board_id}, #{category}, #{front_name}, #{front_path})
mapper.select: SELECT LF.category, M.member_nickname, LF.board_id, LF.member_id, LF.dog_id, title, content, board_date, x, y, dog_name, dog_breed, dog_sex, dog_size, dog_note, found_date, found_location, front_name FROM lost_found LF, dog D, lost_found_photo P, member M WHERE LF.dog_id = D.dog_id AND LF.member_id = M.member_id AND LF.board_id = P.board_id AND LF.board_id = #{board_id}

SELECT match_id, match_title, match_content, photo_name, photo_path, A.member_nickname as receiver_nick, B.member_nickname as sender_nick FROM ( SELECT match_id, match_title, match_content, photo_name, photo_path, sender_id, MB.member_nickname FROM lost_found_matched M, lost_found_request R, member MB WHERE M.request_id = R.request_id AND match_id = #{match_id} AND R.receiver_id = MB.member_id ) A, member B where A.sender_id = B.member_id
mapper.update: UPDATE lost_found SET category = #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x = #{x}, y = #{y} where (board_id=#{board_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

UPDATE dog SET dog_name = #{dog_name, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, dog_breed = #{dog_breed, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, dog_sex = #{dog_sex, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, dog_size = #{dog_size, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, dog_note = #{dog_note, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, found_date = #{found_date, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, found_location = #{found_location, jdbcType = VARCHAR} WHERE dog_id = #{dog_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
